entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
